last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: The final audition comes to an end but what the future holds for the Kirin Art School students is not exactly what you might expect.

name: Dream High
overview: Six dedicated students at Kirin Art High School work to achieve their dreams of becoming stars in the Korean music industry.

seasons.name: Dream High Season 1
seasons.overview: Girin Arts High School is a prestigious school which trains students how to dance and sing. Students, with all different charms and personalities, meet at Girin Arts High School, where they slowly pour their hearts out to each other, and become friends…or for some of them, lovers.. Follow the lives of these students who struggle to become a world star at “Dream High”.

seasons.name: Dream High Season 2
seasons.overview: Girin Arts high school was once a prestigious arts school, grooming the next generation of K-pop stars. But for past several years, the school failed to produce any good artists. When it is about to shut down due to the financial difficulty, OZ Entertainment acquires this school in danger. Now, it is time for Girin Arts School to get back in to the fierce battle of survival!

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Hae Mi wants to become a singer, but loan sharks are hounding her to repay her father's debt -- so she puts her dream of going to Juilliard on hold.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: All kinds of students are auditioning to be a student at Kirin High School. Hae Mi copes with rejection after losing her position to Beak Hee.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Hae Mi is forced to dance behind Sam Dong, but she doubts his talent. Sam Dong becomes attracted to Hae Mi after hearing her sing.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Beak Hee's event is a success. Lee Byung Jun puts Hae Mi and Jin Guk on stage to undermine the director's authority -- and it is a total disaster.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Hae Mi announces that she will beat Beak Hee on the first monthly test. But Hae Mi and Jin Guk are not allowed to take the Performance class.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Sam Dong gets hit by a flowerpot and he is sent to the emergency room. Hae Mi feels responsible for what happened, so she takes care of him.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: CEO Hyun asks Jin Guk to drop out of Kirin High School to go abroad. Hae Mi is shocked by Jin Guk's behavior. Jason and Lia open the showcase.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Jin Guk runs away from the airport and goes to see Hae Mi, but she is already gone. It pains Sam Dong to see Hae Mi suffering.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The school goes to Japan for a field trip, and Hae Mi, Sam Dong and Oh Hyuk fly together. After arriving at Japan, they sing at a wedding for money.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Hye Mi crashes with Ria and Baek Hee, and her stomach growls loudly but her pride won't let her accept the snacks Baek Hee offers.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: CEO Yoon offers Hae Mi a debut and she is happy to be on stage with Jin Guk. Oh Hyuk plans to leave the school, and Hae Mi tries to make him stay.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Oh Hyuk returns and tries to talk to Sam Dong. Sam Dong says he won't be in the showcase. Beak Hee must sing her own composition at the performance.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Sam Dong tells Hae Mi to stay away from him and not to worry about him anymore. To get over her, he starts training with Pil Suk to work on his pitch.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Oh Hyuk finds out Baek Hee was at the scene of the incident. Students are suprised by the challenge of a global contest.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Byung Jik comes back to Korea and asks Hae Mi to go abroad. Sam Dong feels bad that Hae Mi might go away. Pil Suk works on a cable television show.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Doo Shik tells the group that he's running up against a giant wall when it comes to the studios. Baek Hee and Jin Gook try not to hold the group back.

1.name: Dream High Season 1
1.overview: Girin Arts High School is a prestigious school which trains students how to dance and sing. Students, with all different charms and personalities, meet at Girin Arts High School, where they slowly pour their hearts out to each other, and become friends…or for some of them, lovers.. Follow the lives of these students who struggle to become a world star at “Dream High”.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Underdogs from Kirin Art School clash with celebrity minors who are forced to cease work and return to school.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The members of Eden and HershE arrive at Kirin Art School, where things are being turned upside down by Oz Entertainment's President Lee.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The students at Kirin High continue to clash with the idol stars. The boys get into a fight with the paparazzi.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The students at Kirin High continue to clash with the idol stars. The boys get into a fight with the paparazzi.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The showcase results are in and Kirin splits into two. Those in the lower class are shipped off to a scary new location.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: It's Rian's birthday, but plans for a party are ruined and Hae Sung finds herself in more and more trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Yoo Jin and his new band find themselves on stage while Rian continues to hang on at Hae Sung's expense.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Yoo Jin is elevated to a whole other level while the remaining Kirin Art Students scramble to follow in his footsteps.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Hae Sung is finally recognized for her composing talent and the underdogs formulate plan for their performance.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Nana's voice takes a turn for the worse and the fate of the idols is thrown into uncertainty. Meanwhile, the lower class is still hard at work.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Scandal erupts around JB and Shin Hae Sung just as the idols and students gear up for the "Proposal" mission.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: JB makes the final proposal for the upcoming duets and Yoo Jin learns about the circumstances behind his being picked as the first Super Idol.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: When JB is eliminated from the competition, Hae Sung does her best to protect his dreams, but gains insight on his motivations as well.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Lee Seul has a special stage in plan for her father and Shin Hae Sung repays JB with one last gift.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Hae Sung has to make a decision about a life of composing and the Super Idols prepare for the last audition performance.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The final audition comes to an end but what the future holds for the Kirin Art School students is not exactly what you might expect.

2.name: Dream High Season 2
2.overview: Girin Arts high school was once a prestigious arts school, grooming the next generation of K-pop stars. But for past several years, the school failed to produce any good artists. When it is about to shut down due to the financial difficulty, OZ Entertainment acquires this school in danger. Now, it is time for Girin Arts School to get back in to the fierce battle of survival!
